cds::memory::michael::aligned_malloc_heap Struct Reference

Heap based on system provided aligned malloc and free functions More...

#include <cds/memory/michael/allocator.h>

Static Public Member Functions

static void * alloc (size_t nSize, size_t nAlignment)
 Allocates aligned memory block of nSize bytes with alignment nAlignment.
static void free (void *p)
 Frees aligned memory block p that has been previosly allocated by alloc call.

Detailed Description

Heap based on system provided aligned malloc and free functions
